parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb, doko dok'-o of the same meaning; to think; by implication, to seem.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Dative Masculine Plural
str2: To pick out for myself, choose, elect, select. Middle voice from ek and lego; to select.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.
To send, transmit, permit to go, put forth.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
With. A primary preposition denoting union; with or together.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Of Chaldee origin; son of Nabas; Barnabas, an Israelite.
Paul, Paulus. Of Latin origin; Paulus, the name of a Roman and of an apostle.
